note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Share of population with alcohol use disorder vs. drug use disorder
subtitle: Share of the population with an alcohol use disorder versus the share with [drug use disorder](#dod:drug_use_disorder) (which does not include alcohol or tobacco smoking). Drug use disorders include opioids, cocaine, amphetamine and cannabis.

display.name: Share of population with alcohol use disorders
Share of population with drug use disorders
